title: Game Crashed after champion select
body: So i joined a game, loaded into champ select fine, no issues with internet or anything but as soon as the countdown finishes the game stops i cant play or anything now I've uninstalled and now i cant reinstalled this is stupid if i get leaver buster I'm gonna be angry come on Rito...

replies.body:
Issues syncing and staying connected to champ select are usually tied to *incompatible network settings* to cause a poor or unstable connection to our matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend referencing our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm your local network has been properly configured for League.

Let me know if these steps resolved the issue.
Update: Just reinstalled tried to play and it says there is an instance running when there isnt...
